overview.description: High-performance Windows resource monitoring system with real-time metrics collection, aggregation analysis, and web visualization for CPU, Memory, GPU, and VRAM

key_components.name: XhMonitor.Core
key_components.description: Core library containing entities, interfaces, models, and metric providers (CPU, Memory, GPU, VRAM) with LibreHardwareMonitor integration

key_components.name: XhMonitor.Service
key_components.description: ASP.NET Core backend service with REST API, SignalR hub, background workers for metrics collection and aggregation, SQLite persistence

key_components.name: XhMonitor.Desktop
key_components.description: WPF desktop application with MVVM architecture, floating window, system tray integration, and SignalR client for real-time metrics display

key_components.name: xhmonitor-web
key_components.description: React 19 + TypeScript web frontend with real-time SignalR connection, ECharts visualization, i18n support, and Glassmorphism UI design

key_components.name: Metric Providers
key_components.description: Pluggable metric collection providers implementing IMetricProvider interface for CPU, Memory, GPU, VRAM with PerformanceCounter and LibreHardwareMonitor backends

key_components.name: Data Layer
key_components.description: Entity Framework Core data access layer with AppDbContext, repositories, and SQLite database for raw and aggregated metrics storage

key_components.name: Background Workers
key_components.description: Background services for periodic metrics collection (Worker) and multi-level data aggregation (AggregationWorker) with minute/hour/day granularity

key_components.name: SignalR Hub
key_components.description: Real-time communication hub (MetricsHub) for pushing latest metrics to connected clients via WebSocket with automatic reconnection

key_components.name: REST API Controllers
key_components.description: RESTful API endpoints for metrics queries, configuration management, and health checks (MetricsController, ConfigController)

key_components.name: Test Suite
key_components.description: Comprehensive test suite with unit tests, integration tests, and diagnostic tools using xUnit, Moq, and FluentAssertions
